hadiths.text: Muhammed b. Sulaiman narrated from Abu Nu’aim, from Mis’ar, from Ibn ‘Ubaid, from Ibn Ma’qil, from two men of Muzainah, one from the other, one of them is ‘Abd Allah b. ‘Amr b. ‘Uwaim, and the other is Ghalib b. al-Abjar. Mis’ar said:I think it was Ghalib who had come to the Prophet(ﷺ) with tradition

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي أَكْلِ لُحُومِ الْحُمُرِ الأَهْلِيَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding eating the meat of domestic donkeys
